org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions

Class PartitionedMobCompactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions.MobCompactor
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions.PartitionedMobCompactor

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class PartitionedMobCompactor
extends MobCompactor
    An implementation of MobCompactor that compacts the mob files in partitions.

        Description copied from class: MobCompactor
        Compacts the candidate mob files.
        Specified by:
        compact in class MobCompactor
        Parameters:
        files - The candidate mob files.
        allFiles - Whether add all mob files into the compaction.
        Returns:
        The paths of new mob files generated in the compaction.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • select

        protected PartitionedMobCompactionRequest select(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> candidates,
                                                 boolean allFiles)
                                          throws IOException
        Selects the compacted mob/del files. Iterates the candidates to find out all the del files and small mob files.
        Parameters:
        candidates - All the candidates.
        allFiles - Whether add all mob files into the compaction.
        Returns:
        A compaction request.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • performCompaction

        protected List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> performCompaction(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request)
                                                     throws IOException
        Performs the compaction on the selected files.
        1. Compacts the del files.
        2. Compacts the selected small mob files and all the del files.
        3. If all the candidates are selected, delete the del files.
        Parameters:
        request - The compaction request.
        Returns:
        The paths of new mob files generated in the compaction.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

                                                   throws IOException
        Compacts the selected small mob files and all the del files.
        Parameters:
        request - The compaction request.
        Returns:
        The paths of new mob files after compactions.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • compactMobFilePartition

        private List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> compactMobFilePartition(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request,

        Compacts a partition of selected small mob files and all the del files.
        Parameters:

        partition - A compaction partition.
        delFiles - The del files.
        connection - The connection to use.
        table - The current table.

      • compactMobFilesInBatch

        private void compactMobFilesInBatch(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request,
                                    PartitionedMobCompactionRequest.CompactionPartition partition,
                                    Connection connection,
                                    Table table,
                                    List<HStoreFile> filesToCompact,
                                    int batch,
                                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path bulkloadPathOfPartition,
                                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path bulkloadColumnPath,
                                    List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> newFiles)
                             throws IOException
        Compacts a partition of selected small mob files and all the del files in a batch.
        Parameters:
        request - The compaction request.
        partition - A compaction partition.
        connection - To use for transport
        table - The current table.
        filesToCompact - The files to be compacted.
        batch - The number of mob files to be compacted in a batch.
        bulkloadPathOfPartition - The directory where the bulkload column of the current partition is saved.
        bulkloadColumnPath - The directory where the bulkload files of current partition are saved.
        newFiles - The paths of new mob files after compactions.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • compactDelFiles

        protected List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> compactDelFiles(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request,
                                                          List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> delFilePaths)
                                                   throws IOException
        Compacts the del files in batches which avoids opening too many files.
        Parameters:
        request - The compaction request.
        delFilePaths - Del file paths to compact
        Returns:
        The paths of new del files after merging or the original files if no merging is necessary.
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered
